title: Chiefs (Recognition) (No. 10) Order, 2015
content:
31st July,2015 Statutory Instruments 185
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO.57 OF2015
The Chiefs Act
(Laws,Volume16,Cap.287)
The Chiefs (Recognition) (No. 10) Order, 2015
WHEREASthePresidentissatisfiedthatthepersonnamedinthe
ScheduletothisOrderisentitledtoholdtheofficespecifiedinthe

Order,2015.
2. The personnamedintheSchedule is recognisedas being, Recognition
withintheareainZambiadescribedintheSchedule,theholderof ofChief
